## Sec256k1Provider.sign() method

signs prepared payload of size, with a key id

**Signature:**

```typescript
sign(keyId: KmsKeyId, data: Uint8Array, opts?: {
        [key: string]: unknown;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyId | [KmsKeyId](./js-sdk.kmskeyid.md) | key identifier |
|  data | Uint8Array | data to sign (32 bytes) |
|  opts | { \[key: string\]: unknown; } | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

Uint8Array signature
